articles.description: The ‘Twister’ sequel, which brought in over $80 billion at the box office this weekend, is full of good science. But its big reveal is full of spin.
articles.content: OK, so the films twins are possible, but what about its flaming tornado? During one of Twisters climatic moments multiple fireballs fill the stormy skies as a violent tornado runs through an industri… [+2709 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 Review: An Impressive Foldable Despite Repeat Compromises
articles.description: It costs a ton, it's not the most durable device, and the camera still doesn't perform like the Galaxy S24 Ultra.
articles.content: If you’ve read any of the last few reviews I’ve done on Samsung’s foldables over the years, you know I’m particularly keen on this type of device. Foldables are cool, damn it. They let you carry arou… [+7668 chars]

articles.author: promotions
articles.title: Powerful Plug and Play ASIC Miners Released
articles.description: In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrency, ASICRUN, a Hong Kong-based technology company, has recently launched a game-changing series of plug-and-play miners, promising to simplify and amplify the crypto mining experience. The AR1, AR2, and EliteAR miners mark a significant stride as the first-ever series of plug-and-play mining hardware to hit the market. Unleashing Unprecedented Hash Power ASICRUN‘s miners have garnered attention not just for their simplicity but also for their extraordinary hash rates, setting them apart in the competitive mining hardware landscape. Users and...

articles.author: Arvind Hickman
articles.title: Leaders In Live: Nine’s Jordan King & Magnite’s Yael Milbank On The Rapid Rise Of Sports Streaming
articles.description: In this thrilling sports season, Magnite is introducing a new three–part video series titled Leaders in Live. Conducted by B&T, these interviews feature industry experts discussing the power of live sports, the shift towards streaming, and how technology can help unlock numerous opportunities for agencies and advertisers to connect with audiences. articles.author: Heather Hall
articles.title: Advent Diamond unveils ClearXCam 2304: A revolution in X-ray beam monitoring
articles.description: Advent Diamond, a pioneer in diamond semiconductor technology, has announced the release of the ClearXCam 2304, a groundbreaking advancement in X-ray beam monitoring. Traditionally, diamond has been employed for X-ray beam monitoring with four-quadrant monitors. The new ClearXCam 2304, however, sets a new standard by delivering 2304-pixel images of X-ray beams in real-time, thanks to…The post Advent Diamond unveils ClearXCam 2304: A revolution in X-ray beam monitoring appeared first on Research & Development World.
